model-release.title: Model Release
model-release.description: Use people's images safely in your marketing and content. Protect your business from expensive privacy lawsuits.

photo-release-form.title: Photo Release Form
photo-release-form.description: Use photos safely in your marketing without legal risks. Get proper permission for commercial use and advertising.

photography-release.title: Photography Release
photography-release.description: Protect your photography business with comprehensive usage rights. Establish clear ownership and compensation terms.
